movie.title: Hoodwinked Too! Hood vs. Evil
movie.description_intro: Hood vs. Evil will find a teen such as Red Riding Hood who will be training in a distant land with a mysterious, covert group called the Sister Hoods. When Red and the Wolf get called upon by Nick Flippers the head of the Happily Ever After Agency over to investigate the disappearance of Hansel and Gretel.
movie.description_full: Hood vs. Evil will find a teen such as Red Riding Hood who will be training in a distant land with a mysterious, covert group called the Sister Hoods. When Red and the Wolf get called upon by Nick Flippers the head of the Happily Ever After Agency over to investigate the disappearance of Hansel and Gretel.

movies.title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
movies.title_english: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
movies.title_long: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent (2013)
movies.summary: A year has passed since Guts parted ways with Griffith. The Band of the Hawks is plotting a rescue mission to save Griffith who is confined to prison. One night, a group of assassins attack the band, and a bloody battle for survival begins. Just as things are beginning to look grim for them, Guts reappears and saves them. Guts rejoins his friends and embarks on a mission to save Griffith, however.
movies.description_full: A year has passed since Guts parted ways with Griffith. The Band of the Hawks is plotting a rescue mission to save Griffith who is confined to prison. One night, a group of assassins attack the band, and a bloody battle for survival begins. Just as things are beginning to look grim for them, Guts reappears and saves them. Guts rejoins his friends and embarks on a mission to save Griffith, however.

Guts rejoins his friends and embarks on a mission to save Griffith, however.

movies.title: Dog Town
movies.summary: When the inconsiderate residents of Dog Town get a little too loud for their own good, the neighbors take notice and call for help in a last-ditch effort to restore peace and justice.
movies.description_full: When the inconsiderate residents of Dog Town get a little too loud for their own good, the neighbors take notice and call for help in a last-ditch effort to restore peace and justice.
movies.synopsis: When the inconsiderate residents of Dog Town get a little too loud for their own good, the neighbors take notice and call for help in a last-ditch effort to restore peace and justice.

movies.title: Ruben Brandt, Collector
movies.summary: A psychotherapist suffers violent nightmares inspired by legendary works of art. Four of his patients, expert thieves, offer to steal the works since he believes that once he owns them, the nightmares will disappear. He becomes a wanted criminal known as "The Collector". Who will dare to catch him and his gang?
movies.description_full: A psychotherapist suffers violent nightmares inspired by legendary works of art. Who will dare to catch him and his gang?

movies.title: The Apostle
movies.summary: An escaped prison convict attempts to retrieve a loot hidden years ago in a lonely village. Sinister elders, strange disappearances, spirits, a peculiar priest and even the Archpriest of Santiago will cross their paths in a history of horror.
movies.description_full: An escaped prison convict attempts to retrieve a loot hidden years ago in a lonely village. Sinister elders, strange disappearances, spirits, a peculiar priest and even the Archpriest of Santiago will cross their paths in a history of horror.
